testcase.name: raceIngestion store > triggerIngestion > skips ingestion when session is not ready
raceIngestion store > triggerIngestion > sets status to loading then success on successful API call
raceIngestion store > triggerIngestion > sets status to error on API failure
raceIngestion store > triggerIngestion > handles non-Error rejection
raceIngestion store > _handleStaleCredentials > refreshes token and retries ingestion when refresh succeeds
testcase.system-out:
[RaceIngestion] Received stale credentials signal, refreshing token...
[RaceIngestion] Session ready, retrying ingestion

testcase.name: raceIngestion store > _handleStaleCredentials > sets error state when refresh fails
testcase.system-out: [RaceIngestion] Received stale credentials signal, refreshing token...
testcase.system-err: [RaceIngestion] Token refresh failed, cannot retry ingestion

testcase.name: raceIngestion store > _handleStaleCredentials > waits for session to be ready before retrying
testcase.system-out:
[RaceIngestion] Received stale credentials signal, refreshing token...
[RaceIngestion] Waiting for session to be ready...

testcase.name: PKCE > generatePKCE > generates a code verifier of 64 characters
PKCE > generatePKCE > generates a code verifier using only valid characters
PKCE > generatePKCE > generates a base64url encoded code challenge
PKCE > generatePKCE > generates different values on each call
PKCE > generatePKCE > generates a code challenge that is the SHA256 hash of the verifier
PKCE > sessionStorage helpers > stores and retrieves a code verifier
PKCE > sessionStorage helpers > returns null when no code verifier is stored
PKCE > sessionStorage helpers > clears the stored code verifier
